path: artifacts/Iosiro-Synthetix Mimosa Release Smart Contract Audit.pdf

project_path.synthetix: contracts/Iosiro-Synthetix Mimosa Release Smart Contract Audit/synthetix

findings.title: Possible to lock tokens in token contract
findings.description: vSynths could be transferred into the token contract, which might lead to locking tokens.

findings.title: Refactoring suggestions for Issuer.sol#L416
findings.description: The `synthAddresses` function should be renamed to indicate that Synths and not Synth addresses are being returned.

findings.title: Refactoring suggestions for Issuer.sol#L418
findings.description: The `addresses` variable should be renamed to indicate that it contains an array of Synths and not addresses.
